description: Riccardo countries visited as of 15 apr 2025 (public)
context: These are the countries visited by Riccardo (the code writer). Note that row 2 has the totals so you can ignore it when fetching data. You probably want to always fetch the whole 247 rows to respond to any trivia.

description: Some funny translations from English to Italian and beyond
context: Only italians will laugh at this

description: GDG / DevFest events for 2025, concentrating on Italy ones the most.
context: These are public events co-sponsored by Google and ran by Communities. You can judge how big the event is from expected_size, and get some maths done for you under [ dow_start,dow_end, duration]. This contains ~30 events.
